item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, April 9, 2025 at 6:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump reduces tariffs to 10% for 90 days on all countries but China (34 points | 9 comments)
2. The Agent2Agent Protocol (A2A) (261 points | 151 comments)
3. Ironwood: The first Google TPU for the age of inference (215 points | 87 comments)
4. The chroot Technique – a Swiss army multitool for Linux systems (112 points | 63 comments)
5. Visual Reasoning Is Coming Soon (46 points | 13 comments)
6. How much do you think it costs to make a pair of Nike shoes in Asia? (164 points | 274 comments)
7. GPD Pocket 4 Speaker DSP: Configuring PipeWire so laptop speakers sound better (6 points | 1 comment)
8. SpacetimeDB (127 points | 65 comments)
9. Show HN: I built an app to generate story relationships using Mermaidjs (57 points | 14 comments)
10. Quality-of-Life in Tetris Games (95 points | 31 comments)

12. Hardening the Firefox Front End with Content Security Policies (146 points | 57 comments)
13. The best programmers I know (382 points | 237 comments)
14. Ask HN: Why is uptalk intonation so prevalent in ChatGPT voices? (17 points | 12 comments)

22. A guide to reduce screen time (61 points | 58 comments)
23. Show HN: Fermi – A Wordle-style game for order-of-magnitude thinking (25 points | 14 comments)
24. Man pages are great, man readers are the problem (92 points | 126 comments)
25. Obituary for Cyc (416 points | 221 comments)
26. 'Sun-Like' Stars (49 points | 15 comments)
27. Major Flaws in 2025 Meta-Analysis on Fluoride and Children IQ Scores (89 points | 64 comments)

29. Show HN: Comparing product rankings by OpenAI, Anthropic, and Perplexity (26 points | 11 comments)
30. Microphone Input Noise Comparison – Avisoft Bioacoustics (40 points | 7 comments)
